title: Account Bans should work differently
body:
Imo the way reporting and suspensions work in League of Legends is detrimental to the game and society in general. You can troll, feed and ragequit a trillion games in a row and receive no punishment but as soon as you use "hate speech" or other "no tolerance language" you are looking at a banned account. I think this is disgusting as this just encourages people to ruin this game but be justified as long as they don't use dirty words.

I think the opposite should occur, you should say anything you want but purposefully throwing games gets your permabanned. This will dramatically improve the game.

replies.body:
As long as you're not racist or aggressive, as long as you don't run it down, as long as you don't hard troll and keep it soft-trolling, you can throw the game.

I literally inted 19 games in a row by doing the same crap and was not punished. Yet if I swore even once, gone.

People who verbally abusive are doing it wrong. The best thing is that soft-inting makes people flame you, which means you can report them. You can literally bait them into getting banned and riot pats you on the back for it. Oh, I just walled my 11/0 ADC into 5 enemies and she died and handed their carry 1k gold. Damn , spend 2 mins apologising in team chat, claiming it was lag and you weren't thinking right. Do it again later, but still make some plays. Going 0/14 is hard-inting. Going 5/0 and killing your team puts you in the clear as riots system cant see that you're killing your team.
